title: Set up email on your Android phone

steps.text: Open the Settings app, then tap Accounts or Users and accounts.
steps.tts: Open the Settings app, then tap Accounts or Users and accounts.

steps.text: Tap "Add account" and choose the type (Google, Outlook, or Other).
steps.tts: Tap Add account and choose the type: Google, Outlook, or Other.

steps.text: Enter your email address and tap Next.
steps.tts: Enter your email address and tap Next.

steps.text: Enter your password when asked, then tap Sign in or Next.
steps.tts: Enter your password when asked, then tap Sign in or Next.

steps.text: Follow any extra steps (like turning on sync). When you see "Account added," you're done.
steps.tts: Follow any extra steps like turning on sync. When you see Account added, you're done.
